text: Ia mɨdorozim gamua Lodebarɨn nguibam ini,6:13 Hibrun akamɨn aven ziam Lodebar, an akar kam bar an mɨrara ghu, “Ingangarir mɨngariba puvatɨzim.” Ezɨ ziam Karnaim akar kamɨn mɨrara ghu, “Bar gavgafi.” Dughiar kamɨn, Israelia nguibaba mɨsogha me abɨni, ezɨ akam inigha izir gumazim gumazamizibar nɨghnɨziba fasa egha nguibar kamningran ziamning dɨboro.
